item.title: Random drops
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

[code]public static int Jad[] = {6570, 1050, 4753, 4755, 4757, 4759}; // any additional items here

public static int randomJad()
{
    return Jad[(int)(Math.random()*Jad.length)];
}[/code]

put this part in item2 under public class item2 {

and put this part

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomJad(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

in npchandler in public void MonsterDropItem

Read full topic

item.title: Random drops

item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

ok i want some itesm to have a random drop so plz help look.

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { ItemHandler.addItem(6570, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); ItemHandler.addItem(1050, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); ItemHandler.addItem(4753, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); ItemHandler.addItem(4755, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); ItemHandler.addItem(4757, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); ItemHandler.addItem(4759, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }
